title: 2019 Recap Special
description: The Besties bid farewell to 2019 with the highs and lows of some of the biggest trends of the year. NOTE: This will be the last full episode on the wide feed. Starting on January 3, 2020, The Besties weekly can only be found on Spotify. Follow and listen for free!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
